rows.label: bf07290100_0010
rows.name: Rex.

rows.label: bf07290100_0020
rows.name: We've come a long way. I think it's time for a break.

rows.label: bf07290100_0030
rows.name: What? But-

rows.label: bf07290100_0040
rows.name: Hold your horses. There's a long way to go yet.

rows.label: bf07290100_0050
rows.name:
Hey, you too, Nia. 
Come rest your head on my lap if you like.

rows.label: bf07290100_0060
rows.name: Why don't you rest your head in your arse?

rows.label: bf07290100_0070
rows.name: I'm sorry, everyone. I had no idea.

rows.label: bf07290100_0080
rows.name:
There is no need to apologize.
I understand.

rows.label: bf07290100_0090
rows.name: Hana, now is good time to cool drive furnace!

rows.label: bf07290100_0100
rows.name: Aye-aye Masterpon!

rows.label: bf07290100_0110
rows.name:
Meeehmehmehmeh! Hothothothot!
Meehmeh! Hot! Hot!

rows.label: bf07290100_0120
rows.name: Masterpon! Hana is sorry!

rows.label: bf07290100_0130
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf07290100_0140
rows.name:
Emergency air.
It might help.

rows.label: bf07290100_0150
rows.name: Oh, thanks.

rows.label: bf07290100_0160
rows.name: Ah, not like that!

rows.label: bf07290100_0170
rows.name:
You have to hold your nose, and then
inhale really deeply.

rows.label: bf07290100_0180
rows.name: Now stretch out, and puff out your chest.

rows.label: bf07290100_0190
rows.name:
Is this...
...another of your salvager tricks?

rows.label: bf07290100_0200
rows.name: Go on, just try it.

rows.label: bf07290100_0205
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ADLIB

rows.label: bf07290100_0210
rows.name: Wow, that really did the trick.

rows.label: bf07290100_0220
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: bf07290100_0230
rows.name:
When I was starting out, this was one of the
first things the other salvagers taught me.

rows.label: bf07290100_0240
rows.name:
Even though they acted like my parents, they never really
taught me anything worthwhile.

rows.label: bf07290100_0250
rows.name:
I did manage to pick up a couple of
useful tricks, though.

rows.label: bf07290100_0260
rows.name: Parents, huh.

rows.label: bf07290100_0270
rows.name: My real parents didn't teach me shit either.

rows.label: bf07290100_0280
rows.name:
He was a well-known lord in Gula.
A real big cheese.

rows.label: bf07290100_0290
rows.name:
He made me study hard, but it was all how to be a
proper lady. Which fork to use.

rows.label: bf07290100_0300
rows.name:
Nothing that's doing me any good now.
Just useless shite.

rows.label: bf07290100_0310
rows.name:
You were some kinda high society princess?
I can't picture it.

rows.label: bf07290100_0320
rows.name: Shut it, you.

rows.label: bf07290100_0330
rows.name: I hated studying.

rows.label: bf07290100_0340
rows.name:
But, looking back...
Those were the happiest times of my life.

rows.label: bf07290100_0350
rows.name: There was my da... And...

rows.label: bf07290100_0360
rows.name: My big sis. The three of us.

rows.label: bf07290100_0370
rows.name: You had a sister?

rows.label: bf07290100_0380
rows.name:
Yeah. She was very frail.
I spent a lot of time at her bedside.

rows.label: bf07290100_0390
rows.name:
My da brought doctors from all over to
try and help her. He tried so hard.

rows.label: bf07290100_0400
rows.name: It was all he thought about.

rows.label: bf07290100_0410
rows.name: After that point...

rows.label: bf07290100_0420
rows.name: ...my memories aren't so happy.

rows.label: bf07290100_0430
rows.name: Nia...

rows.label: bf07290100_0440
rows.name:
Da spent all his money on chasing a cure,
and lost his position as a lord.

rows.label: bf07290100_0450
rows.name: From then on, we became drifters.

rows.label: bf07290100_0460
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf07290100_0470
rows.name: It was a tough life. It took its toll on my sister.

rows.label: bf07290100_0480
rows.name: She died, not long after.

rows.label: bf07290100_0490
rows.name: Anyway, I'm sorry for talking your ear off.

rows.label: bf07290100_0500
rows.name: Thanks for the salvager trick. It really worked.

rows.label: bf07290100_0510
rows.name:
Sneaky git. If you had this all along,
why did you hold out on me?

rows.label: bf07290100_0515
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ADLIB

rows.label: bf07290100_0520
rows.name: I feel much better. Shall we go, Rex?
